import React from 'react' import { Form, Button, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import Checkout from '../components/Checkout' import { savePaaymentMethod } from '../actions/cartAction' import { useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' const PaymentScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) const { shippingAddress } = cart if (!shippingAddress) { navigete('/shipping') } const [paymentMethod, setPaymentMethod] = useState('PayPal') cons const submitHandler = ((e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatchEvent(savePaaymentMethod(paymentMethod)) navigete('/palaceholder') }) return (

Payment Method

SlectMethod setPaymentMethod(e.target.value)}>
) } export default PaymentScree
